response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product embodies innovation, quality, and functionality, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to elevate their experience or business. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that is not only worth its weight in value but also comes with a promise of unparalleled service and support. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and your endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 750000}
